bug_report.summary: Login Error messages in the login form are displayed in England
bug_report.steps_to_reproduse: open front end https://www.test-sklep.be:8443/, follow inloggen link, fill required fields with invalid data, click inloggen button, pay attention to error messages
bug_report.actual_result: Error messages in the login form are displayed in English
bug_report.expected_result: Error messages in the login form are displayed in the chosen language
